mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, SELLER_ID, CATEGORY_NO, PROD_DETAIL, MANUFACTURE_DAY, AS_YN, SELL_QUANTITY, SELL_AMOUNT, IMAGE_FILE, TRAN_STATUS_CODE, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{prodNo}, #{prodName}, #{sellerId}, #{categoryNo}, #{prodDetail}, #{manufactureDay}, #{asYn}, #{sellQuantity}, #{sellAmount}, #{imageFile}, '001', sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PROD_NAME = #{prodName}, CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}, PROD_DETAIL = #{prodDetail}, MANUFACTURE_DAY = #{manufactureDay}, AS_YN = #{asYn}, SELL_QUANTITY = #{sellQuantity}, SELL_AMOUNT = #{sellAmount}, REG_DATE = sysdate WHERE PROD_NO = #{prodNo}
mapper.select: SELECT PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, SELLER_ID, CATEGORY_NO, PROD_DETAIL, MANUFACTURE_DAY, AS_YN, SELL_QUANTITY, SELL_AMOUNT, IMAGE_FILE, TRAN_STATUS_CODE, REG_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PROD_NO = #{prodNo}
